Text:
Same video as everyone else.  Save over-saturation of colors with same blurred watermark, but this is 300 MB smaller.  Audio is TS, so same as other TS marked torrents.  

So this is the king of 720x320s so far, by size difference.  Just keep the player that small or else it is going to be blurry.

@tflagger997 wrote: "but this is 300 MB smaller"

Yup, if you're going to download something that's worthless crap, it should definitely be as small as possible.
